name: Senior Front-end developer
description: Financial platform for compare finances and intelligently manage your money is looking for Senior Front-end developer. Role will be responsible for:  Detailed code review and recommendations for re-factoring. Code creation. Providing feedback on design. Providing feedback on Code architecture.  Qualifications:   3+ years of Front-end experience a plus (React/Redux). Creation and consumption of RESTful API’s through Python to Back-end databases to both write and retrieve data for the web Front-end. AWS experience a plus. Experience with JIRA a plus.  Stages:  Interview with DigitalHR recruiter. Interview with company. Technical interview.
